frontmatter.title: Deploying Zephyr OS on the FRDM-K64F development board
frontmatter.blurb:
A starting point to my re-discovery of microcontroller programming and the world of IoT. Loading and running your
first Zephyr OS application on the FRDM-K64F Freedom Development Platform.

frontmatter.blurb:
I've been digging more into Kubernetes lately trying to figure out the best way to monitor certain resources and
metrics within my cluster.

frontmatter.title: Generate an HTTPS cert using LetsEncrypt
frontmatter.blurb: This article is the third in a series of articles outlining how to setup a highly available, scalable, serverless single page application (SPA) using AWS S3.

frontmatter.title: Inspect Docker traffic with tcpdump
frontmatter.blurb:
I was recently involved in a project deploying a Django application to AWS EC2 Container Service. I had spent a few
days building the app into a container alongside a RabbitMQ and Postgres containers. I made use of docker compose to
run & tested locally.

frontmatter.title: Use Ansible to Deploy a Docker Container
frontmatter.blurb:
Deploying containers to a remote server can be rather tedious. Sometimes all you need is to deploy your container on
a remote server.

frontmatter.title: Using Custom SSL Certs with Elixir
frontmatter.blurb:
While there is a great use-case for token based authentication, there is an emerging trend of using self-signed
ssl certs to authenticate against an API
